coreAttributes.name: Riding Whip
coreAttributes.description: This riding whip is embossed for grip and to help channel aura into attacks, but it seems better suited for the dervy back home. Something tells you dominion didn't make these for a races.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the strap around [npc.her] wrist, keeping it ready for use and [npc.her] hand free.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slap)] [npc.her] whip against [npc2.name], [npc.her] aura leaving brief marks.
Swinging at [npc2.name] , [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as the magic laced strands zap against [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(whip)] [npc2.name] upside [npc2.her] head, causing [npc2.her] to lean momentarily!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(whip)] at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up connecting with air.
Swinging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] whip, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slaps)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] whip, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
